abstract: Morgan Stanley became the sixth large financial services firm to reimburse employees with same-sex partners for the extra taxes they pay on health insurance.
snippet: Morgan Stanley became the sixth large financial services firm to reimburse employees with same-sex partners for the extra taxes they pay on health insurance.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships

lead_paragraph: Another financial titan has decided to extend a benefit that will put its gay and lesbian employees on equal footing with their heterosexual co-workers.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley to Equalize Health Costs for Gay Employees
